summary: Backend engineer shipping reliable, observable services at scale. Bias for simple designs, crisp APIs, and fast feedback loops.

bullets.text: Designed and shipped {N} microservices with SLOs; reduced p95 latency by {X}%.
Built event-driven features with Kafka and idempotent consumers; eliminated duplicate processing.
Hardened data layer (Postgres) with migrations and read replicas; improved availability.
